pageContext.claim: “We've picked up $10 trillion in worth. China, by the way, has gone down $15 trillion, OK?”
pageContext.analysis: U.S. net worth has increased by about $6 trillion since Trump took the oath of office, to about $100 trillion. It's unclear why Trump claims China's net work has declined by $15 trillion. China's net worth was $29 trillion in 2017, and it is projected to grow to $39 trillion by 2022. If Trump is referring to stock market value, China's stock market has declined by about $2.5 trillion since the start of 2018.
